name: Rocket Rumble (SmartAs)
description:
Cursor Left/Right or A/D to rotate, Space to Thrust. 

Should work with game controller. Left stick rotates, bottom face button (Equivalent to A on Xbox controller) to Thrust

 I'll add touch controls at some point.

Rocket Rumble

Thanks for taking the time to check out Rocket Rumble!

This is very much a work in progress. 

Might be a bit chuggy in full screen until I drop the WebGL quality.

The game needs a title screen/menu system, player lives/health, timer, power-ups, more enemies, and a soundtrack  along with many, many more levels. 

Level 3 is currently a bit of a sandbox where I try new things. The gun won't be there in the final version., but the level design is challenging/fun so probably won't change a great deal.

Level 2 will probably end up being in a world with higher difficulty.

Comments, suggestions, flames (not too harsh, please) all welcome.
